title: Heartseeker Varus.
body:
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Varus_4.jpg

Funnily enough I was like "when is Riot gonna release a sexualized male skin" and there it is.

replies.body:
Haha very funny. You think that Heartseeker Varus is too far? Please have a look at Kitty Cat Katarina and tell me.

I'm a girl for one and personally, I like this skin. It may not be suitable for a male audience but its still a good skin. I like that Riot is giving this game some man-service. He looks quite good :3
Agreed. I am not attracted to men, but I think this is a good, cool skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Slim Chaedi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LFu2KJXq,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2015-02-12T01:47:41.087+0000)
>
> Agreed. I am not attracted to men, but I think this is a good, cool skin.

You're not fooling anyone here   {{champion:7}} {{champion:48}}

> [{quoted}](name=VENI VIDI VICI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LFu2KJXq,comment-id=00000000000100000000,timestamp=2015-02-12T11:37:12.917+0000)
>
> You're not fooling anyone here   {{champion:7}} {{champion:48}}

Hahahaha, no... but maybe if they made a sexy Ezreal skin...

> [{quoted}](name=Slim Chaedi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LFu2KJXq,comment-id=000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-12T22:35:56.621+0000)
>
> Hahahaha, no... but maybe if they made a sexy Ezreal skin...

Best comment this thread.

I need the skin like I need water. Mighty need. Plus it's looking like Varus will finally have a decent skin, up til now, his normal skin has been my preferred, as the others are kind of meh.{{champion:110}}

> [{quoted}](name=LuciferFallen,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LFu2KJXq,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-11T06:59:59.371+0000)
>
> I need the skin like I need water. Mighty need. Plus it's looking like Varus will finally have a decent skin, up til now, his normal skin has been my preferred, as the others are kind of meh.{{champion:110}}

Blight - Little too messy/all over the place on colours
Arclight - Little too "seraphic"
ArcOps - Little too blue

tbh i still have a bias towards Blight Crystal (and his classic) because both fit him the most but yeah, Cupid Varus will add some more to the table (for Taric at least)
